title: Assassin's Creed Mirage is just one of three newly revealed games in the series
description: Ubisoft has announced a whole slate of upcoming Assassin's Creed games, with some surprises in the pipeline.

title: Marvel, Star Wars and 20th Century Studios D23 showcase: Everything announced
description: From new MCU and Star Wars projects to 20th Century Studios movies, here's what was revealed on Day 2 of D23 Expo 2022.

title: What Android 13 will mean for your business
description: Android 13 will give employees more privacy and admins more control, but the best features are yet to roll out.

title: Google could already be working on a Pixel Tablet Pro
description: Edits made to the Android 13 code suggest that Google is working on more than one tablet at the moment.

title: iPhone 15 Pro tipped to get some major upgrades – and a new Ultra name
description: Apple is going to make the iPhone 15 Pro even more Pro, according to a well-placed source in the business.

title: The greatest Lord of the Rings strategy game still isn’t legally available
description: Battle for Middle-earth might be the best Tolkien strategy game we’ll ever get. Too bad you can’t buy it anymore.

title: 3D printing with Mars dust? It’s not as silly as it sounds
description: New 3D printing materials could save space agencies hundreds of thousands of dollars in weight reductions.

title: Intel Arc GPUs could be canceled already
description: We really hope this isn’t true, and it is still just a rumor – but things sound pretty dire for Arc graphics cards.
